function.description: Replace the provided XML node with the new node which must be a string containing valid xml.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Assuming we have an XML file note.xml which contains the following:
example.code: < note id="1"> < to>Tove< /to> < from>Jani< /from> < heading>Reminder< /heading> < comment>This was sent to James as well< /comment> < comment>John has not responded to the invitation< /comment> < body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body> < /note>

< note id="1"> < to>Tove< /to> < from>Jani< /from> < heading>Invitation< /heading> < comment>This was sent to James as well< /comment> < comment>John has not responded to the invitation< /comment> < body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body> < /note>
